attributes.action: Demand the resignation of Chief Medical Officer Chris Whitty
attributes.additional_details:
Children have a 99.9% survival rate, so very little risk to them, they are not super spreaders. Children are however at serious risk of harm from this vaccine.  https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/S221475002100161X?fbclid=IwAR11d5e5V541stWl_Shp00rFUSjKYdpTyLSEMFHseQfhFI-q5PV6CzNDnM
BMJ https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=y6l9w3TIpyM
He should step down as he has broken a vital covenant in medicine, DO NO HARM he is allowing harm to our children via the unethical use of this vaccine.
attributes.background: Chris Whitty ignored medical advice of the JCVI and medical ethics in allowing experimental Covid 19 vaccination of children under 18.This is not a childhood vaccine, in experimental stages, no long term studies on longer term health outcomes (fertility and teratogenicity in future generations).

rejection.details: We can't publish petitions calling for people to lose their jobs.
